```py
>>> signal.lti(1, 2, 3, 4)
StateSpaceContinuous(
array([[1]]),
array([[2]]),
array([[3]]),
array([[4]]),
dt: None
) 
```

```py
>>> signal.lti([1, 2], [3, 4], 5)
ZerosPolesGainContinuous(
array([1, 2]),
array([3, 4]),
5,
dt: None
) 
```

```py
>>> signal.lti([3, 4], [1, 2])
TransferFunctionContinuous(
array([3., 4.]),
array([1., 2.]),
dt: None
) 
```
